resources.string: Do you want us to get in touch with you?
How did you find out about FDUM?
I don\'t know how I can help the organization.
Please, write your email below to send a code
A code was sent to your email, please write it below.
Please enter the new password twice.
Enter the amount you want to donate:
WHEN THERE IS THE WILL TO HELP AND SOMEONE WHO KNOWS TO DO IT.
If you are willing to help, we can place your help where it is most needed so that it generates a better and greater impact.
With your donation you have the power to transform tomorrow. Remember that all your financial donations are tax deductible.
Join and donate in our different channels!
You can make transfers through your Electronic Banking application or Mobile Application. Likewise, deposits can be made at the windows of any BBVA branch or at convenience stores.
Each peso donated to Fundación Dibujando un Mañana is multiplied by $ 6.16 in social return on investment; according to a 2019 Philanthrophilia study.

That we have the ability to accompany our allies (companies and individuals) to make the safest and most transparent investments; and CSOs to be efficient and sustainable; by carrying out the whole process step by step; giving added value beyond the financial investment that is made.

Our Model is inspired by a systemic and international vision that allows us to dimension in the same panorama the different social actors that must be linked through alliances to achieve Sustainable Development and achieve our purpose. We are an organization aware of the context in which the social problems of girls, boys, adolescents and young people are gestated, as well as the willingness of companies, people and organizations to help, that is why we focus on the union of these wills, based on international standards such as Triangular Cooperation, Management for Development Results and Human Rights Approach, to strengthen them and enhance their reach and social investment.
We are dedicated to promoting the social development of girls, boys and adolescents in vulnerable situations in Mexico and Central America with a social investment model.

In October 1997 the Fundación Diseño Ilustrajando un Mañana, A.C. was born. with the objective of investing in institutions that serve girls, boys and adolescents to promote institutional development and guarantee its sustainability.The more than 20 years of evolution have been marked by different events of transformation, strengthening, innovation and transparency thanks to its seven presidents, 40 members of the Board of Directors, different advisors in eight work Committees and the Operational Team.The road has been long and there is still much to do. That is why we are convinced that the route is to generate alliances to create the appropriate conditions that favor a dignified life for all the people of our country and the region.
We are Fundación Dibujando un Mañana!

We are an organization aware of the context in which the social problems of girls, boys, adolescents and young people are born, as well as the willingness of companies, people and organizations to help. We focus on the union of these wills.
With your help we will build a better Mexico.

Through our Social Investment Model we strengthen civil society organizations so that they provide comprehensive care to girls, boys and adolescents, based on a Human Rights Approach and a Management Approach for Development Results.
You do not have an account?
" We are an organization dedicated to helping street youth."

resources.string: " Achieve inclusive and quality education, as a tool that allows them to have the necessary skills for sustainable development"
Guarantee them a healthy life and exercise their physical and mental well-being, by investing in health and disability projects.
Promote adequate conditions and means of life, as well as increase the quantity and quality of opportunities for girls, boys and adolescents.
Provide special protection, through specialized care, to girls, boys and adolescents who are victims of neglect of care, abandonment, child abuse and violence.
Empower all girls, as well as promote equality for girls, adolescents and young women. This cause encompasses all of the above.
Provide emergency response through humanitarian aid to those affected by natural disasters.
Join us to improve the lives of those who need you
